撈.definition: to fish up; to dredge up

撈一把.definition: to profiteer; to gain some underhand advantage

撈什子.definition: encumbrance; burden; that awful thing (colloquial); nuisance

撈取.definition: to dredge up; to scoop up from the water; to fish for; to gain (by improper means)

撈本.definition: to get one's money back (esp. gambling); to recoup one's losings

撈油水.definition: (coll.) to gain profit (usu. by underhand means)

撈稻草.definition: (fig.) to clutch at straws (in desperation); to take advantage of the situation (unscrupulously)

撈錢.definition: lit. to dredge for money; to make money by reprehensible means; to fish for a quick buck
